main.title: Portfolio
main.description: A modern portfolio developed with Next.js, showcasing my web development skills and projects. It features smooth animations and an intuitive user interface.

main.title: Madabina
main.description: A project that implements PCA from scratch to visualize clustering and reduce dimensions, only using with NumPy.

main.title: Ramax
main.description: A project that involves visualizing qualitative data and encoding it using OneHotEncoding for quantification. It serves to impute data through optimization algorithms and machine learning.

main.title: Majlis
main.description: An administration tool for disciplinary councils for university departments, built with Electron, Express.js, and React.

main.title: Livri
main.description: A B2B SaaS platform for restaurants and their suppliers, built with Django Rest Framework and Next.js.
